name: Sudomemo Ã— WiiLink: Watch Flipnotes on the Nintendo Wii!
description:
Sudomemo is collaborating with WiiLink to bring Sudomemo exclusives and your favorite Flipnotes to the Nintendo Wii through the special application, "Wii Room"! Watch Featured Flipnotes, Sudomemo special productions, and more directly on your Wii or Wii U. For more information, visit https://flipnot.es/wiiroom !
Video created by Ryal from the WiiLink team :)
